enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The calendar of meetings for FCCC bodies for 2000-2003 (FCCC/CP/1999/L.12) was adopted by the COP on Thursday, 4 November, following recommendation to the COP by SBI on Monday, 1 November.
The calendar sets three sessional periods for 2000: 12-16 June and 11-15 September, each preceded by week-long informal meetings, followed by COP-6 in November.
Two sessional periods are scheduled for each of the following years to 2003.
